main event: On November 6, 1967, multiple sightings of unidentified aerial phenomena were reported in Covington, Indiana, involving bright light objects that were observed moving and changing direction.
interesting points: The objects observed were described as circular in shape, about the size of baseballs, emitting bright white or colored lights,Several reports indicated the objects hovered silently for several minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing,Multiple witnesses reported seeing similar bright lights in the sky,Investigation by Project Blue Book found the cases remain inconclusive due to lack of physical evidence,Photographs taken by witnesses were of poor quality and did not conclusively identify the objects.
witness description: local residents who observed the unidentified aerial phenomena
